General.Name: Panda Dairy Corp
General.Description: Panda Dairy Corporation engages in research and development, production, and sale of dairy products in China and internationally. Its products include cheese, including mozzarella cheese and cheese sticks; evaporated milk, including modulated and full-fat evaporated milk; coconut juice; condensed milk, including reconstituted sweetened condensed milk, modified sweetened condensed milk, and sweetened condensed milk; light cream; and sweetened milk sauce. The company offers its products under the Panda brand. Panda Dairy Corporation was founded in 1996 and is based in Wenzhou, China.
General.Address: No. 650-668, Jianxing East Road, Wenzhou, China, 325800
